translation:
Reply Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

On the 28th of the past month the official letter that Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

Along with Your Excellency Rs. 57$000, signed by me, came into my hands, and in due time I will fulfill the part concerning collection and remittance, on which allow me Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency

Fazenda do Salso, October 12, 1837.

(a) Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães.

[On folio 1 verso of document CV-227]
